title: 82/107/EEC: Commission Decision of 29 January 1982 approving an outline programme to improve public amenities in certain less-favoured agricultural areas of the Federal Republic of Germany under Council Regulation (EEC) No 1938/81 (Only the German text is authentic)
header:
COMMISSION  DECISION
of 29 January 1982
approving an outline programme to improve public amenities in certain less-favoured agricultural areas of the Federal Republic of Germany under Council Regulation (EEC) No 1938/81
(Only the German text is authentic)
(82/107/EEC)
THE COMMISSION OF THE EUROPEAN
COMMUNITIES
main_body: The outline programme to improve public amenities in certain less-favoured agricultural areas of the Federal Republic of Germany, pursuant to Article 4 of Regulation (EEC) No 1938/81, communicated by the Government of the Federal Republic of Germany on 2 October 1981 and supplemented on 4 December 1981 is hereby approved.
This Decision is addressed to the Federal Republic of Germany.
attachments:
Done at Brussels, 29 January 1982.
For the Commission
Poul DALSAGER
Member of the Commission
(1) OJ No L 197, 20. 7. 1981, p. 1.
